title: 820-2850 backlight dont come back from open lid/wake from sleep
message:
board has garbage distorted screen due to vram issue. Reflowed vram and screen come back OK. Backlight is OK.

when close lid, the machine will go to sleep, but screen wont come back when lid is open. Actually there are stuff displayed on the screen and can be seen when shine light from apple logo on the back. Just that backlight remained off.

Same thing happen if I click on "sleep", it will wake without backlight. 

Only when force restart backlight will come back on. I also used magnet to test the lid sensor around the edge when the lid is open, with the light shining from the back, I can see the display toggle on and off when I move the magnet.

[additional info: However, display turned off due to inactivity after 1 minute will come back with backlight on]

title: 820-2850 backlight dont come back from open lid/wake from sleep
message: sorry case closed. I flashed the gmux with the one from 820-2915 incorrectly.... reflashing gmux with 820-2850 works.
